overview: Alakdang bato: Directed by Carlo J. Caparas. With Donna Villa, Madel De Leon, Lito Lapid, Melissa Mendez. THE ACTION - ADVENTURE - FANTASY FILM TELL THE STORY OF A PEACE-LOVING MAN WHO IS PUSHED BY CIRCUMSTANCES TO FIGHT AN AVARICIOUS FAMILY VICTIMIZING HIS TOWNSPEOPLE.
title: Alakdang Bato
